name: Atlaspad
description: Atlaspad is a multi-chain launchpad platform focused on security, privacy and interoperability. This platform brings next-generation blockchain projects to investors using AI (Artificial Intelligence) and Real-World Assets (RWA) technologies. It aims to seamlessly transfer tokens on EVM, Mina and other compatible blockchains. In addition, Atlaspad AI Chatbot guides users through the blockchain ecosystem, providing accurate, fast and user-friendly solutions. With Telegram bot integration, it facilitates many transactions such as crypto transactions, NFT tracking, wallet updates and market analyses.
